# Importing data to R

```{r}
# install.packages(tidyverse)
# install.packages(here)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)

# Import data to R
gapminder <- here("gapminder.csv") %>% 
  read.csv()

# Print the imported data
library(openxlsx)


```
